adhyapanaya paudgalikaranaya ha adhyapanaya aadayam margayak kirimata salasum karamin sitina rajayakin apata mitawada yamak balaporoththuwiya nohaka.dinen dina rajaye pasal wasiyanne paudgalika pasalwalata athawanamini.dinendina arena tiyushan kadada apata kiyanne rajaye pasalwala garawatima noweda.pasal walin shishyayangen mudal ekathukathukirima dinen dinama wadiwemin pawathi,eema mudal gewimata nohakiwa sisun horakame yayi.thama daruwan pasal yawimata indiyawe maw waru wakugadu da wikunayi.ema thathwaya lankaweda siduwimata yannedayi api nodanimu.adhyapana paudgalikaranayata wiruddhawa shishya prajawa kothekuth hada naguwath ee sambandawa mahajanathawage pibidimak nomatha.owun thawamath rupawahiniya idiripitata gos kakuldeka udathabagena "sujatha diyani" balamin siti.owunge diyaniyata puthata anagathayedi siduwana barapathala awinishchithathawaya owunta nopenima dukata karunaki.aadaraniya amme thaththe bohodurata me gewi yanne nidahas adhyapanaye awasan husma poda wiyahakiyi.eya rakaganima ho nihadawa balasitima oba sathu karyaki.
